================================
### Vaccination Confidence in Canada: Online Conversation and Audience Analysis

#### Solicitation Details

| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number  | 1000245919 |
| Tender Closing Date  | 2023-01-10, 14:00:00 (local time) |
| Contracting Entity  | Health Canada |

#### Project Background

In preparation for enhanced vaccination education, promotion, and outreach, the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a consultant to analyze vaccine-related conversations on social media and PHAC's social media campaign performance.

#### Scope of Work

The consultant will:

- Analyze vaccine-related conversations and participants on Twitter and various social media channels (Reddit, Blogs, Forums, and News) for up to three years of historical data.
- Evaluate PHAC's social media initiative and campaign performance, including content engagement and influence on vaccine-related conversation.
- Provide analysis, insights, and recommendations to support enhanced vaccination education and promotion efforts.
